questions.question_text: Which of the following is the MOST important reason to involve external forensics experts in evidence collection when responding to a major security breach?

choices.C: Reducing the risk to an acceptable level
choices.D: Minimizing the impact to business processes
choices.B: Identifying business processes the controls can support

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Minimizing impact to a buisness process is about Risk Appetite. Risk appetite does define acceptable risk but the goal should be "Reducing" risk to that acceptable level. The correct answer is C .

Selected Answer: D
D. Minimizing the impact to business processes
